ValidationRule.description: Account ID and Duplicated Acct ID/Parent ID are the same
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( Account_ID__c == Duplicated_Account_ID__c , NOT ISBLANK( Account_ID__c), RecordType.Name == "Deactivate Account" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: (024) Account ID and Duplicated ID/Parent-Account ID have the same values
